Body:
assert_raises_message(errors.CompileException,
    "Named block 'y' not allowed inside of <%call> tag", Template,
    """

            <%self:foo x="5">
                <%block name="y">
                    this is the block
                </%block>
            </%self:foo>

            <%def name="foo(x)">
                foo:
                ${caller.body()}
                ${caller.y()}
            </%def>
        """
    )
